member.name: T:MKTO.Server.ServiceTask.Logging
member.summary: The service server task class to undertake some specfic business tasks for the Specified Business object group. All methods can be directly called by other Form Server Tasks or remotely called by Client Tasks through client proxy classes.

member.name: M:MKTO.Server.ServiceTask.Logging.#ctor
member.summary: Initialize the instance of AppServiceServerTask class and set the default resource bundle to 'xxxxxx' LD Group.
